availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Tyler Alexander (Adair County, Kentucky, lawyer. )

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, lawyer. Henry County, Virginia, native. Son of Joseph Henry Alexander and Sally Watkins Bouldin Alexander. Married to Ellen Katherine Frazer Alexander in Adair County, Kentucky, on May 24, 1849. Lawyer in Cumberland County in 1850. Lawyer in Adair County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Adair County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Burkesville, p. 557.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, District 1, p. 153.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, District 1, p. 1.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Adair County Marriages, Film #0077223361, p. 9.
